website_summaries.verdict: Budget wall kit that looks the part and brings the substance.
pros: Excellent value for money and it will make your bathtub look good
The panels help to fight against grout
cons: It can be heavy at first when you start handling it

customer_reviews.title: ..."EXCELLENT,  BEAUTIFUL and Easy to Install "...PERFECTION at it's finest !
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL PRODUCT !!! EXCELLANT !!!....I can use a couple more tubes of the Premier XtraBond250 silicon Sealant WHITE.....tub sealant... it is a beautiful product ,5-STARS ( can I please have 2 more of the exact silicone sealant it matches perfect and I read the reviews on it so I can see why it is such a high /hard to get product....this company is outstanding in delivery and shipment methods...no possible damage because it is sealed so tightly in the shipping box....
customer_reviews.author: Gregory  G. Neish

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Really heavy, bulky and cheap looking. Going to go with tile instead. Tile looks cheaper in price too. Returned item, and because it's "a large item", my refund can take up to 2 WEEKS. Usually items purchased from Amazon they give you refund once in transit. But not on this item. If you have a set budget, don't purchase unless you are sure you'll gonna keep it. Otherwise, Amazon will hold on to your money for up to 2 weeks. Was doing this renovation for my 87 year old Mom. Who is currently fighting lung cancer. I was trying to lift her spirits and adjust bathroom to make it easier for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: jctru17

customer_reviews.title: Each gives slighty different tips about how to best apply adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Suround itself is solid. Not the flimsy acrylic surrounds often purchased at and below this price point. Read the swanstone directions and adhesive tube directions for easiest installation. Each gives slighty different tips about how to best apply adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Pretty easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Pretty easy to put up. I had a little trouble finding directions.
customer_reviews.author: Gma M

customer_reviews.title: Great tub surround.
customer_reviews.text: Surround feels very sturdy and is of good quality. The only problem was bracing the back wall. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive not included
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with adhesive, used bath tub wall adhesive loctite brand. Easy installation took the hubby 4 hours total. Looks great! Walls thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Needed some adjustment to fit corners. needed special glue at seams of corner overlap.
customer_reviews.author: new@62

customer_reviews.title: overall nice
customer_reviews.text: We've had it installed for about 6 months. Overall satisfied. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: cjlfes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. It met all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swanstone Products Are NICE
customer_reviews.text: Shopped a long time for a new Tub Wall Kit...this was perfect for our remodel. Relatively easy to install...looks very NICE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Keller

customer_reviews.title: Total pain in the arse to install-17 pages of instruction ...
customer_reviews.text: Total pain in the arse to install-17 pages of instruction. 3 piece is much simpler and seamless. 5 pieces creates seams in back corners. Go with the 3 piece for less headache.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C Gaer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We had to modify it a tiny bit to make it fit. Shipped with enough adhesive to put up 3 surrounds. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Flipping a house and thought I could get away with this product. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

product_meta.title: Swanstone TI50000.010 Veritek Glue-Up 5-Panel Bathtub Wall Kit, 32-in L X 60-in H X 59.625-in H, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteSwan produces American-made high-performing surfacing solutions for the bath and kitchen. Customers trust Swan products for superior impact strength, heat resistance and durability. Their mission is to provide customers with the highest quality products, most responsive customer service and the best lifetime value in the industry. Swan surfaces, LLC is headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri, with manufacturing facilities in Centralia, Illinois. The Following product lines are manufactured in the USA: Swan stone, veritek, Swan high-gloss.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Swanstone Veritek Five Panel Tub Wall Kit in White # TI-5-010. Want to make a lustrous, lasting impression in your bath? Make it with Swanstone tub walls. Perfect for both remodeling projects and new construction, Swanstone tub walls give you the best of both worlds - durability and elegance. So relax and wrap yourself in the exceptional beauty and comfort of Swanstone.
feature_bullets: TI-5 Kit Includes: One back panel with molded-in soap dish, two corner panels, two side panels with molded-in convenience shelves, two apron strips and color coordinated silicone.

Includes installation kit; Includes one back panel with molded-in soap dish, two corner panels, two side panels with molded-in shelves, and two apron strips Swantile surface; Made of Veritek with no surface coating to chip or crack - color runs throughout Faucet and tub not included
Designed for areas 29-32-Inch D x 53-60-Inch W x 59-5/8-Inch H;Has the look of real tile with no grout to clean.
Stunning look adds elegance to your bath;Will not mold or mildew;Ideal for both remodeling projects and new construction
Built-in shelves for storage of toiletries on all three walls;Patented design keeps shower head spray from aiming at seams

specifications.Included Components: One back panel, two corner panels, two side panels, two apron strips and color coordinated silicone
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars19 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
